Our Core Services

Comprehensive solutions designed to revolutionize waste management across industries and municipalities.

Smart IoT Sensors

Advanced sensors monitoring fill levels, temperature, humidity, and gas emissions in real-time with 99.9% accuracy.

  • Real-time monitoring
  • Weather-resistant design
  • Long battery life
  • Wireless connectivity

AI Route Optimization

Machine learning algorithms that create optimal collection routes, reducing fuel consumption by up to 40%.

  • Dynamic route planning
  • Traffic integration
  • Fuel optimization
  • Real-time adjustments

Advanced Analytics

Comprehensive dashboard with predictive analytics, custom reports, and actionable insights for strategic planning.

  • Predictive analytics
  • Custom dashboards
  • Automated reports
  • KPI tracking

Mobile Solutions

Cross-platform mobile applications for field teams, supervisors, and citizens with offline capabilities.

  • Cross-platform apps
  • Offline functionality
  • Push notifications
  • GPS tracking

System Integration

Seamless integration with existing municipal systems, ERP platforms, and third-party applications.

  • API integration
  • Legacy system support
  • Data migration
  • Custom connectors

Security & Compliance

Enterprise-grade security with data encryption, compliance monitoring, and audit trails.

  • End-to-end encryption
  • GDPR compliance
  • Audit trails
  • Access controls

Our Implementation Process

A proven methodology that ensures successful deployment and maximum ROI for your waste management transformation.

01

Assessment & Planning

We analyze your current processes and design customized IoT solutions to optimize efficiency and performance.

02

Installation & Setup

Our certified technicians install sensors and configure the entire system infrastructure.

03

Training & Onboarding

Comprehensive training for your team on system operation, maintenance, and best practices.

04

Monitoring & Support

24/7 system monitoring with proactive maintenance and dedicated customer support.
